metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11758 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in OpenEXR before 2.4.1. There is an out-of-bounds read in ImfOptimizedPixelReading.h.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11758` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr24 - 2.3.0-6ubuntu0.1
openexr - 2.3.0-6ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-6ubuntu0.1').
